attributes.action: To campaign to ensure that Tony Blair does not become the EU President
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair has been responsible for one of the largest foreign policy mistakes since Suez. 

More importantly hundreds of soldiers and hundreds of thousands civilians have lost their lives due to this. 

The UK and world was lied to for the reasons for the war. 

Is Tony Blair the right person to represent the EU in the 21st century, an organization that has done so much to foster and maintain peace in Europe. 

We call upon the UK government to vocally and clearly state that they do not support a Blair candidacy or even his continued involvement in the Middle East.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
